name: The Amazing, Spectacular and MegaFantastic Ultragame of rescuing the Princess with the Longest Title possible
name_original: The Amazing, Spectacular and MegaFantastic Ultragame of rescuing the Princess with the Longest Title possible
description:
"In a magical world, a princess has been trapped at the top of the castle. The hero must rescue her, as has been his entrusted mission. For this, YOU must overcome multiple obstacles to achieve your goal in time"

"The Amazing, Spectacular and MegaFantastic Ultragame of rescuing the Princess with the Longest Title possible" is a simple platform video game with NES aesthetics, with 5 Levels

Made in - Game Maker 8???
